name: Vegan Bullshit Bingo
description:
It's a typical Bingo layout but with common vegan phrases. It's meant to be played while talking to an omnivore and then ticking the boxes when a phrase drops. If you are lucky, you get your own bullshit Bingo.

The App is available in English, German, Dutch, Russian, Polish, Afrikaans, Xhosa & Shona
